title: Google\Cloud\Redis\V1\WeeklyMaintenanceWindow
name: WeeklyMaintenanceWindow
description:
Time window in which disruptive maintenance updates occur. Non-disruptive updates can occur inside or outside this window.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.redis.v1.WeeklyMaintenanceWindow

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.day
params.description: Required. The day of week that maintenance updates occur.

params.name: data.start_time
params.description: Required. Start time of the window in UTC time.

params.name: data.duration
params.description: Output only. Duration of the maintenance window. The current window is fixed at 1 hour.
